description: Loads a collection from the current back-end by its id and returns it as a vector cube. The data that is added to the data cube can be restricted with the parameters "spatial_extent" and "properties".

parameters.name: spatial_extent
parameters.description:
Limits the data to load from the collection to the specified bounding box or polygons.

The process puts a pixel into the data cube if the point at the pixel center intersects with the bounding box.

Set this parameter to `null` to set no limit for the spatial extent. Be careful with this when loading large datasets! It is recommended to use this parameter instead of using ``filter_bbox()`` or ``filter_spatial()`` directly after loading unbounded data.

crs.description: Coordinate reference system of the extent, specified as as [EPSG code](http://www.epsg-registry.org/), [WKT2 (ISO 19162) string] (http://docs.opengeospatial.org/is/18-010r7/18-010r7.html) or [PROJ definition (deprecated)](https://proj.org/usage/quickstart.html). Defaults to `4326` (EPSG code 4326) unless the client explicitly requests a different coordinate reference system.
crs.title: EPSG Code

schema.title: No filter
schema.description: Don't filter spatially. All data is included in the data cube.

returns.description: A vector cube for further processing.
